channel.title: Abby Barmore's Github Site
channel.description: Recent content on Abby Barmore's Github Site

item.title: Did the age of a team impact its success in the 2020 season?
item.description: Nebraska head coach Scott Frost walked up to the podium to kickoff spring football with a Zoom media conference following a disappointing 3-5 season. And just like every spring Frost has been at the helm, he was positive and excited about getting to work and the clay his staff has to mold. He said something that caught my ear and got my wheels turning. “In my opinion, it’s played out in college football, and probably college basketball, that through the COVID year the teams that had veteran players probably overachieved a little,” Frost said on March 29.

item.title: Is Big Ten football more competitive in the Scott Frost era?
item.description: Is Big Ten football more competitive in the Scott Frost Era than the Bo Pelini Era? Since Nebraska joined the Big Ten in 2011, Pelini is the only Husker head coach to win 10 or more games in a season and the only coach to win nine games in a season multiple times. When Pelini’s seven-season reign was ended after the 2014 season, Mike Riley was hired and went 19-19 in three seasons.

item.title: Worst Games in 2019 College Football
item.description: What were the worse games in the 2019 College Football season? First we need to clean the data and text in order to use it seamlessly in this coding project. First load the libraries. library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.3 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.0.5 v dplyr 1.0.3 ## v tidyr 1.1.2 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.4.0 v forcats 0.

item.title: Abby Barmore
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
